item.title: Programming Languages Influence Network 2019 - Dark Background
item.description: A network graph showing 454 programming languages connected by 761 influence relations. Highly influential languages like Lisp, Smalltalk, C, Java, C++, Haskell and Python are shown as larger circles as compared to languages with less influence on others like PHP, Rust and Go. The influence relation data was retrieved from Wikidata December 30, 2019. A great gift for programmers who are into digital art.

item.title: Programming Languages Influence Network 2019 - Light Background
item.description: A network graph showing 454 programming languages connected by 761 influence relations. Highly influential languages like Lisp, Smalltalk, C, Java, C++, Haskell and Python are shown as larger circles as compared to languages with less influence on others like PHP, Rust and Go. The influence relation data was retrieved from Wikidata December 30, 2019. A great gift for programmers who are into digital art.

item.title: CO2 emissions (metric tons per capita)
item.description: Information on choropleth maps showing the Carbon dioxide emissions in metric tons per capita for the world's countries from 1960 to 2014.

item.title: World Map of Countries by CO2 Emissions per Capita from 1960 to 2014
item.description: These choropleth maps show CO2 emissions in metric tons per capita from 1960 to 2014 based on data from the Carbon Dioxide Information Analysis Center and Oak Ridge National Laboratory.

item.title: Forest Area Percentage of Land Area
item.description: Information on choropleth maps showing the forest area percentage of land area for the world's countries from 1990 to 2016 based on data from the Food and Agriculture Organization.

item.title: World Map of Countries by Forest Area Percentage of Land Area
item.description: These choropleth maps show the forest area percentage of land area for the world's countries from 1990 to 2016 based on data from the Food and Agriculture Organization.

item.title: Rust Programming Language Influence Network
item.description: A network graph showing 24 programming languages connected by 47 influence relations. It includes languages the were influenced by Rust or influenced Rust and Rust itself. More influential languages are shown as larger circles as compared to languages with less influence on others. The influence relation data was retrieved from Wikidata in 2019. A great gift for programmers who are into digital art.

item.title: C Programming Language Influence Network
item.description: A network graph showing 64 programming languages connected by 122 influence relations. It includes languages the were influenced by C or influenced C and C itself. More influential languages are shown as larger circles as compared to languages with less influence on others. The influence relation data was retrieved from Wikidata in 2019. A great gift for programmers who are into digital art.

item.title: World Map Made of Hexagons - Geographic Pattern Map Design
item.description: A map of the world with the landmasses made up of hexagons rendered in the Winkel tripel projection.

item.title: Berlin Rails, Roads and Water - Dark Geographic Map Design
item.description: A map of the city of Berlin, Germany and surroundings showing railways and roads in light gray and water in blue on a dark background created with data from OpenStreetMap.
